css: @font-face{font-family:FCBayernSans;src:local('FC Bayern Sans Light'),url(/assets/fonts/FCSans/FCBayernSans-Light.woff2) format('woff2'),url(/assets/fonts/FCSans/FCBayernSans-Light.woff) format('woff');font-weight:300;font-style:normal}@font-face{font-family:FCBayernSans;src:local('FC Bayern Sans Regular'),url(/assets/fonts/FCSans/FCBayernSans-Regular.woff2) format('woff2'),url(/assets/fonts/FCSans/FCBayernSans-Regular.woff) format('woff');font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-display:swap}@font-face{font-family:FCBayernSans;src:local('FC Bayern Sans SemiBold'),url(/assets/fonts/FCSans/FCBayernSans-SemiBold.woff2) format('woff2'),url(/assets/fonts/FCSans/FCBayernSans-SemiBold.woff) format('woff');font-weight:600;font-style:normal;font-display:swap}@font-face{font-family:FCBayernSans;src:local('FC Bayern Sans Bold'),url(/assets/fonts/FCSans/FCBayernSans-Bold.woff2) format('woff2'),url(/assets/fonts/FCSans/FCBayernSans-Bold.woff) format('woff');font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-display:swap}
